name: todo-app
description: A three-tier TypeScript todo application with Next.js, Express, and PostgreSQL

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w api" "npm run dev -w frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build -w api && npm run build -w frontend
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start -w api" "npm run start -w frontend"
scripts.clean: npm run clean -w api && npm run clean -w frontend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check -w api && npm run type-check -w frontend
